document_data.name: Helm's Hundred
document_data.mainbody: The '''Helm's Hundred''' was an army that operated out of [[Helm's Hold]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The group was some 100 soldiers strong.
document_data.Activities: During the spring months each year, the Helm's Hundred would venture out from Helm's Hold to [[Sundabar]], in order to fight against the [[demon]]s that infested [[Hellgate Keep]].
